doc:
Rod Perry (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rod_Perry_(actor) 0 Rod Perry (born July 30, 1941) is an American actor best known for his role as Sgt. David "Deacon" Kay in the 1970s TV series S.W.A.T.. Perry also played leading roles in two blaxploitation movies in the mid-1970s: The Black Godfather (1974) and The Black Gestapo (1975). Other TV appearances include Barney Miller, Good Times, Babylon 5, and the 1974 TV movies The Autobiography of Miss Jane Pittman and Trapped Beneath the Sea. In the 2000s, Perry had a cameo role in the 2003 film version of S.W.A.T., playing the father of the character he portrayed three decades earlier in the TV series, played on this occasion by LL Cool J. Rod_Perry ( born July_30_,_1941 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_role as Sgt._David_"_Deacon_"_Kay in the_1970s_TV_series_S.W.A.T. . Perry also played_leading roles in two_blaxploitation_movies in the_mid-1970s : The_Black_Godfather_(_1974_) and The_Black_Gestapo_(_1975_) . Other_TV_appearances include Barney_Miller , Good_Times , Babylon_5 , and the_1974_TV_movies The_Autobiography of Miss_Jane_Pittman and Trapped Beneath the_Sea . In the_2000s , Perry had a_cameo_role in the_2003_film_version of S.W.A.T. , playing the_father of the_character he portrayed three_decades earlier in the_TV_series , played on this_occasion by LL_Cool_J.
